column5: Has anyone ever caught a lake trout in the summer near Point Au Baril or in the open bay of Georgian. got a down rigger and i want to try it out but have no idea where to go thats close by.
You may get a very very rare one out in the big water but your best bet is to go south towards parry sound. ive fished the area for almost 15 years now and never caught on up in PAB specifically.
Lakers are everywhere in Gbay.Â  Go out deep, find a few hooks and drop jigs on their heads.
